meanings.sent1: Bookselling is a fun job at the bookstore.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy bookselling because I get to help customers find their favorite novels.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried bookselling by knocking over books in the library.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like bookselling, spreading joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: Bookselling is like a treasure hunt, searching for the perfect book for each reader.

meanings.sent1: Bookselling requires good marketing strategies to attract customers.
meanings.sent2: She opened a bookselling shop in the heart of the city.
meanings.sent3: The bookselling competition was fierce, with each store trying to outdo the other.
meanings.sent4: In the world of bookselling, knowledge is the most valuable currency.
meanings.sent5: His passion for bookselling was evident in the way he curated his book collection.
